casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF LACEE L., etc. Stephanie L., Appellant;
v.
Administration for Children's Services, Respondent, Dekodia L., Respondent. Motion No: 2018-798 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided August 30, 2018

***929Motion by Human Rights and Gender Justice Clinic of the City University of New York School of Law, et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
